fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Overseer: Pick a player at the start of the game. When they are in danger of dying from pending attacks during this phase, you will be alerted.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Shields: Gain a Block! [3 uses, 2 CD] 
- Protect: Choose a player. Guard! an available attack on them of your choice. [3 uses, 2 CD]
- Train: Upgrade a card in your hand. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D2]
